PrecisRegulations Amending the ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE REGULATIONS, 1988 by replacing those provisions (sections 55 to 58) which currently prohibit all members of the Force from engaging in political activities, with rules that are less restrictive and tailored to the particular circumstances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0026 Publication Date: 1999-01-06
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE REGULATIONS, 1988 by
replacing those provisions (sections 55 to 58) which currently prohibit all
members of the Force from engaging in political activities, with rules that
are less restrictive and tailored to the particular circumstances.
